column1: # DataFrame: A DataFrame is a two-dimensional
column2: tabular data structure in pandas. In this CSV
column3: each row represents a record (observation) and each column represents a variable (day
column5: condition). The entire set of data can be seen as a DataFrame.

column1: # Series: A Series is a one-dimensional labeled array in pandas. In the DataFrame
column2: each column can be considered a Series. For example
column3: the "day" column is a Series containing labels for each day
column4: and the "temp" column is a Series containing temperature values.
